rails.help: Creates a rails application recipe based on the type, defaults to Apache

ha-redis.help: Creates a highly available Redis and HAProxy recipe

nodejs.help: Installs NodeJS and provides an NPM LWRP

apache.help: Creates a recipe for installing and tuning Apache2.4

mariadb-galera.help: A modern MariaDB powered Galera Cluster

glusterfs.help: A GlusterFS Clustering recipe for easy-peasy networked filesystems

rackspace_networks.help: A utility for working with Rackspace Cloud Networks, ServiceNet and PublicNet

application-php.help: Creates an example PHP application recipe

application-node.help: Creates an example NodeJS application recipe

ruby.help: Creates a recipe for installing ruby via RBENV

varnish.help: Creates a recipe for installing Varnish

statsd.help: Creates a StatsD server recipe - required NodeJS

elk.help: Creates an ElasticSearch, LogStash and Kibana example recipe
